result.title: The Regenstein Library
result.text: The Regenstein Library. Things gotta get done and you're the one to do them, so put on a pot of coffee, drag out the power strip, and let's get to work. Sometimes you think other people need to step up and give you a hand, but you're going straight to the top with or without them. Hole up in the sprawling Regenstein library and start checking items off the to-do list.

result.title: Max Palevsky Residence Hall
result.text: Max Palevsky Residence Hall. Loud, colorful, and everyone's best friend, you like having a good time and living in the now. You're the life of every party you walk into, and won't let anyone forget who you are. While some might find your love of color a little over the top, you'd rather be fab than drab.

result.title: Saieh Hall
result.text: Saieh Hall. You were born wearing business casual. You gotta keep you emotions in check and your eye on the corner office to get ahead in today's market, and that's just the way you like it. Whenever people think they've seen all you got, you surprise them with something fresh.

result.title: Mansueto Library
result.text: Mansueto Library. You are very large and made primarily of UV blocking glass panels tiled to create a dome. You house millions of volumes in an underground bookstack where items are retrieved by robots. You are named after Joe and Rika Mansueto

result.title: Harper Memorial
result.text: Harper Memorial. You appreciate the finer things in life: stained glass, fair trade coffee, and elegant gothic libraries like Harper. You can often be found up late in your plush armchair and reading a volume of English poetry in front of a roaring fire. You may currently be wearing an ascot.

result.title: Cobb Hall
result.text: Cobb Hall. Cool, smart, and laid back, you're way more important than most people realize, but that's just the way you like it. You're a quiet leader, and your strength is behind the scenes, keeping everything running smoothly and efficiently instead of feeling the need to be in front all the time. Also, you enjoy a good hipster coffee shop now and then.

answer.text: About average, but I find ways to bring attention to myself
I have a very imposing figure
I'm shorter than I am wide
Taller than average, but I slouch
That giant glass dome they were always hanging out with
Larry David. He was too a character!
Whatever's going on, I love to compete!
Baseball, the game of the free-market!
Soccer: simple in rules but complex in strategy

question.text: When do you feel most active?

answer.text: I love reading late into the night
My hours are 8:00 AM to 12:45 AM, with the circulation desk closing earlier
I'm usually pretty mellow all the time

question.text: One last question, did you appear in the movie Divergent?

answer.text: No, what are you talking about?
I had a small cameo, yes.
